channel.title: Webclient Freezes
channel.description:
Okay so I got my web client to download Cache and sprites and everything 100% Correctly but when I or someone else tries to log on it freezes at "loading..." even though you can see them in game if you use the non-web client client.
I don't want to post the URL because of advertising but if you need to see it then I can PM you it.

item.title: Webclient Freezes

item.description:

I don’t want to post the URL because of advertising but if you need to see it then I can PM you it.[/quote]
Pm me the address, cuz it might be the address causing the problems, last time i uploaded my cache and it frooze at Downloading cache 4%
